title: Week 7 Matchups + Funny Bones, Wheel of Shame - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/22
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a Win in Week 7! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of Week 7 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Broncos vs Browns game, and the “Wheel of Shame” in the Fantasy Faceoff segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 22nd, 2021.
  
 (04:10) - Thursday Night Recap
 (08:30) - FootClan Friday
 (09:25) - NFL News
 (15:40) - Fantasy Forecast
 (16:35) - Bengals at Ravens
 (26:45) - Eagles at Raiders
 (31:25) - Lions at Rams
 (36:00) - Texans at Cardinals
 (39:30) - Bears at Buccaneers
 (44:10) - Colts at 49ers
 (48:10) - Saints at Seahawks
 (53:45) - Fantasy Faceoff
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
